About.title: AGM INVEST, your partner since 2004
About.subtitle: Discover our history, our values and the team that supports you daily.

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.p1: Since its creation, AGM INVEST's mission has been to <highlight>democratize access to credit</highlight> by offering total transparency and human support.
Mission.p2: We believe that every project deserves a tailor-made solution, far from standard banking norms.

Values.title: Our Values
Values.v1: Total transparency on fees and conditions.
Values.v4: Constant innovation in our simulation tools.

t1.name: Sophie Martin
t1.content: An exceptional support from start to finish. Our advisor was able to reassure us and find a rate we would never have had alone.

t2.name: Thomas Dubois
t2.content: Speed, efficiency and professionalism. AGM INVEST allowed me to realize my investment project in record time.

t3.name: Marie & Pierre L.
t3.content: Thanks to the renegotiation of our loan, we are saving over 150 per month. Thanks to the whole team for their listening.

identity.title: Identity Documents
identity.description: Valid ID or Passport (front/back) as well as the family record book.

income.title: Proof of Income
income.description: Your last 3 salary slips and your last 2 complete tax notices.

bank.title: Bank Statements
bank.description: All your bank account statements for the last 3 months.

home.title: Proof of Address
home.description: Electricity, Gas, landline phone bill less than 3 months old or rent receipt.

sales.title: Sales Agreement

Reviews.title: <highlight>Customer</highlight> Reviews

Reviews.description: Discover testimonials from those who trusted us for their financing and insurance projects.

r1.name: Thomas Dubois
r1.comment: Impeccable service! I got my financing in less than 2 weeks. The team is very professional.

r2.name: Marie Laurent
r2.comment: Excellent experience. The advisor accompanied me at every step. I highly recommend AGM INVEST.

r3.name: Pierre Martin
r3.comment: Very satisfied with the service. Quick and transparent process. A few documents to provide but that's normal.

r4.name: Sophie Bernard
r4.comment: I am delighted! My file was processed quickly and I was able to buy my car without stress.

r5.name: Julien Petit
r5.comment: Top service! The team is reactive and listening. My credit was validated in 10 days.

r6.name: Camille Durand
r6.comment: Good overall experience. The follow-up is excellent and the advisors are competent.

r7.name: Alexandre Roux
r7.comment: Perfect! Simple and efficient process. I had my car financing without problem.

r8.name: Léa Moreau
r8.comment: I recommend 100%! Professional service, fast and transparent. Thanks to the whole team.

r9.name: Nicolas Simon
r9.comment: Very good service. The deadlines were respected and the advisor was available to answer my questions.

r10.name: Emma Leroy

r11.name: Lucas Blanc

r12.name: Chloé Garnier

CGU.title: Terms of Use
CGU.subtitle: Terms of use for the services offered by AGM INVEST via its online platform.

Section1.title: 1. Object
Section1.content: These Terms of Use (TOU) define the conditions of access and use of the services offered by AGM INVEST via its online platform.

Section2.title: 2. Access to Service
Section2.p1: Access to the platform is reserved for users with a validated account.
Section2.p2: AGM INVEST reserves the right to refuse or suspend an account in case of non-compliance with these conditions.

Section3.title: 3. Nature of Services
Section3.warning: ⚠️ AGM INVEST is not a banking institution, nor a credit institution, but a regulated financial intermediary.

Section4.title: 4. Verification Process
Section4.content: Full access to services requires a multi-step verification procedure defined by AGM INVEST.

Section5.title: 5. Payments
Section5.p1: Some services may require the payment of security deposits.
Section5.p2: These amounts are clearly communicated to the client before any validation.

Section6.title: 6. Liability
Section6.content: Data is processed in accordance with current regulations. Consult our

Section7.title: 7. Personal Data
Section7.content: Data is processed in accordance with current regulations. Consult our

Section8.title: 8. Termination
Section8.content: AGM INVEST reserves the right to suspend an account in case of fraud, false declaration or abusive use of the service.

Section9.title: 9. Applicable Law
Section9.p1: These TOU are subject to French law.
Section9.p2: Any dispute falls under the jurisdiction of the French courts.

Mentions.title: Legal Notices
Mentions.subtitle: Mandatory information regarding the site editor and hosting conditions.

Section2.title: 2. Activities
Section2.p1: AGM INVEST is a company specialized in management consulting and administrative support. Its fields of intervention notably include:

list.li1: Brokerage in banking operations and payment services
list.li2: Consulting for business and other management advice
list.li3: Administrative assistance for individuals and professionals

Section3.title: 3. Regulation - ORIAS
Section3.p1: The company is registered with the Single Register of Insurance, Banking and Finance Intermediaries (ORIAS) under number 13000958, consultable on the website

list.li1: Banking Operations and Payment Services Broker (COBSP)

Section3.p2: Brokerage activity is subject to the control of the Prudential Supervision and Resolution Authority (ACPR) located at 4 Place de Budapest, CS 92459, 75436 Paris Cedex 09.

Service.title: Customer Service
Service.text: For any question, you can contact us by email:
Service.address: Or by mail to our headquarters in Mulhouse.

Hosting.title: Hosting
Hosting.name: Vercel Inc.
Hosting.address:
440 N Barranca Ave #4133
Covina, CA 91723
United States

Footer.desc: Site edited by AGM INVEST - Mulhouse.
Footer.disclaimer: Every credit project must be carefully studied. A credit commits you and must be repaid.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: We place a major importance on the protection of your personal data and the respect of your privacy.
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how <bold>AGM INVEST</bold> collects, uses and protects the information you transmit to us when using our services.

Section1.title: 1. Collected Data
Section1.description: As part of your financing request, we collect the following types of data:

list.li1: <bold>Identity:</bold> Last name, first name, date and place of birth, nationality.
list.li2: <bold>Contact details:</bold> Postal address, email, telephone number.
list.li3: <bold>Situation:</bold> Marital status, household composition, type of housing.
list.li4: <bold>Professional life:</bold> Type of contract, income, seniority.
list.li6: <bold>Documents:</bold> Identity documents, proof of income and residence.

Section2.title: 2. Purposes of Processing
Section2.description: Your data is processed for specific purposes:

c1.title: File Analysis
c1.desc: Study the feasibility of your financing project.

c2.title: Account Management
c2.desc: Administer your client area and requests.

c4.title: Communication
c4.desc: Exchange with you on the progress of your file.

Section3.title: 3. Sharing of Data
Section3.p1: Your information is never sold to third parties. It is shared only with:

list.li1: Our banking and insurance partners for the study of your financing.
list.li3: Legal authorities in case of regulatory obligation.

Section3.p2: All data transfer is protected by secure protocols.

Section4.title: 4. Your Rights
Section4.p1: In accordance with the GDPR, you have rights over your personal data:

list.li2: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

Section4.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us by email at:

Cookies.title: Cookie Policy
Cookies.subtitle: Transparency on the use of trackers on our platform.
Cookies.intro: AGM INVEST uses cookies to improve your experience, ensure the security of our site and analyze its traffic.

Essential.title: Essential Cookies
Essential.desc: Necessary for the operation of the site. They allow navigation and access to secure areas (such as your client space).

Functional.title: Functional Cookies
Functional.desc: Allow to remember your preferences (language choice, form information) to simplify your navigation.

Analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
Analytics.desc: Help us understand how visitors use the site to improve our services anonymously.

Section2.title: 2. Managing your choices
Section2.intro: You can configure your browser to block cookies or be alerted to their presence:
Section2.note: Note: Disabling certain cookies may affect the proper functioning of the site.

Refund.title: Refund Conditions
Refund.subtitle: Policy regarding security deposits and application fees.

Section1.title: 1. Secure Authentication Deposit
Section1.p1: As part of the identity verification and anti-impersonation procedure, a security deposit may be requested.
Section1.p2: This amount serves exclusively to authenticate the source of funds and the reality of the bank account associated with the file.
Section1.p3: The deposit is placed on a secure transit account for the duration of the analysis.

Section2.title: 2. Refund Terms
Section2.content: The security deposit is returned in full without delay to the client as soon as the verification procedure is finalized, whether the credit is granted or refused.

Section3.title: 3. Non-refund cases
Section3.intro: The refund may be suspended only in the following cases:

list.li1: Proven attempt at fraud or identity theft.
list.li3: Use of stolen or illegitimate means of payment.

Section4.title: 4. Deadlines
Section4.content: The refund transfer is initiated within 24h to 48h working hours after the closing of the file. The reception time then depends on your banking establishment.

Section5.title: 5. Disputes
Section5.content: In case of dispute, the client can contact AGM INVEST customer service by email or registered mail.

Disclaimer.title: Financial Disclaimer
Disclaimer.subtitle: Important warnings regarding the commitment related to credit.

warning.title: Legal Warning
warning.content: A CREDIT COMMITS YOU AND MUST BE REPAID. CHECK YOUR REPAYMENT CAPACITY BEFORE YOU COMMIT.

nature.title: Nature of activity
nature.p1: AGM INVEST acts as an <bold>administrative intermediary partner</bold> and not as a direct lending institution.
nature.p2: Our role is to facilitate the constitution, analysis and presentation of your file to our financial partners.

list.li1: The granting of financing depends on strict eligibility criteria defined by the banks.
list.li2: AGM INVEST cannot guarantee the final acceptance of a file by a third party.
list.li3: The rates displayed are indicative and depend on the risk profile of the borrower.

indicative.title: Indicative Information
indicative.content: The simulations carried out on the site have <bold>no contractual value</bold>. Only the loan offer issued by the bank after full file study is authentic.

Trust.title: Trust & Security
Trust.subtitle: Your security is our absolute priority. Discover how we protect your interests.
Trust.intro: Choosing AGM INVEST means choosing a partner that places transparency and data protection at the heart of its model.

admin.title: Administrative Verification
admin.desc: Rigorous study of each document to ensure the solidity of your request.

multi.title: Multi-Step Procedure
multi.desc: A structured workflow to minimize errors and maximize the chances of approval.

contract.title: Contractual Framework
contract.desc: All our services are framed by clear mandates and in compliance with the law.

trace.title: Traceability
trace.desc: Full history of your requests accessible at any time in your space.

data.title: Data Protection
data.desc: AES-256 encryption and secure servers in compliance with banking standards.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.desc: A team of experts available to answer your security questions.

individual.title: Individual Processing
individual.content: Each file is processed manually by our analysts. We refuse total automation of credit scores to prioritize the contextual study of your situation.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.content: We commit to <bold>total transparency</bold>: no hidden fees, no bad surprises. You are informed in real time of each step.

Ads.title: Advertising Notices
Ads.subtitle: Regulatory information regarding our commercial communications.

warning.title: Financial Prudence
warning.content: No payment of any kind can be required from an individual before obtaining one or more money loans.

nature.title: Nature of our services
nature.p1: The advertisements presented on this site concern <bold>financing support and brokerage services</bold>.
nature.p2: AGM INVEST presents solutions negotiated with a wide network of banking partners.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of files
acceptance.content: The acceptance of a file by AGM INVEST for study <bold>does not prejudge the final loan agreement</bold>.

results.title: Variable results
results.content: The rates and potential gains displayed in our advertisements are based on the best conditions recently obtained for similar profiles.

verified.title: Identity Verified ✅
verified.message: Congratulations! Your account is now fully operational.

rejected.title: Action Required ⚠️
rejected.message: Your verification has been rejected. Please check your emails.

partialRejection.title: Documents to complete
partialRejection.message: Some documents have been rejected. Please submit them again.

newMessage.title: New Message 💬

Home.subtitle: Here is an overview of your financing activities.

rejected.title: I inform you that:
rejected.message: Your financing request has been rejected by our services after studying your file. For more details or to speak with an advisor, please contact our support.

approvedIdentityNeeded.title: Congratulations! Your credit is granted 🚀
approvedIdentityNeeded.message: Excellent news: your financing has been validated and your balance is ready to be credited. A final identity verification is required to activate the fund transfer.

approvedDepositNeeded.title: Action Required
approvedDepositNeeded.message: Your identity has been confirmed! To finalize the activation of your credit, the authentication deposit is now necessary.

idRejected.title: Identity Rejected
idRejected.message: Your identity verification request has been rejected. To know the reasons and resubmit your documents, please contact our customer service.

partialRejection.title: Documents to complete
partialRejection.message: Some documents in your file require correction or have not been validated. Please check your verification space to update them.
